INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the concentrations of ethinylestradiol, with risk of lower contraceptive effectiveness. Furthermore, increase of the concentrations of the progestin
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Use an estroprogestin contraceptive with at leaset 30µg of ethinylestradiol.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase pf the plasma concentrations of elvitegravir by decrease of its metabolism by the itraconazole
INTERACTION.COMMENT: With the elvitegravir co-administered with the cobicistat [sic], clinical monitoring. Limit the maximum dose of itraconazole to 200 mg/day.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of elvitegravir by decrease of its metabolism by the ketoconazole
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Avec the elvitegravir co-administered with the cobicistat [sic], clinical monitoring. Limit the maximum dose of ketoconazole to 200 mg/day.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the minimal concentrations of elvitegravir
